Posts.Content: Sep 25, 2007 12:13AM Negative3Grade3 wrote: I am in the same boat myself. The odd one out to do neoadjuvant (triple negative, grade 3, 1.7 cm tumor) but I'm content with my decision and I'm glad to hear that there are some of us out there who decided to do something different since the studies out there can only report major trends but they will never offers us qualtitative evidence about how we will respond or not to the treatment we decided to go with.
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo in September?? where are you ladies Methusala StillKicking
